text: Flag of Rotalia Rotalia is an Estonian student corporation. The corporation is established on 10 November 1913 in Saint Petersburg. Since 1918 the corporation main activity took place in Tartu and Tallinn, Estonia. When Estonian SSR was established then the corporation existed in exile. Chapters were established e.g. in Sweden, Australia, Canada and United States. In 1988 the corporation's activity re-established in Tartu. The corporation's motto is: "honesty, safety, self-consciousness and integrity" (). ==References== ==External links== * Category:Student organizations in Estonia
title: Rotalia (corporation)
